item.title: Allcargo Terminals Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Bearish Trend Ahead
item.description: Allcargo Terminals Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average, signalling a potential shift towards a bearish trend. This development highlights a deterioration in the stock’s momentum and raises concerns about its long-term prospects amid already challenging market conditions. Time: 3 minutes ago

item.title: Eimco Elecon Q3 FY26: Sharp Profit Surge Masks Valuation Concerns
item.description: Eimco Elecon (India) Limited, a specialised manufacturer of underground and opencast mining equipment, has reported mixed signals in its December 2025 quarter results, with strong sequential profit growth offset by concerning valuation metrics and deteriorating technical trends. The stock surged 8.67% on January 08, 2026, trading at ₹1,768.80, yet remains 41.06% below its 52-week high of ₹3,001.10, reflecting investor uncertainty about the company's premium valuation amidst modest operational performance. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Transformers & Rectifiers India Q3 FY26: Strong Profit Surge Masks Valuation Concerns
item.description: Transformers & Rectifiers India Ltd. (TARIL) delivered a robust performance in Q3 FY26, with consolidated net profit surging 117.78% quarter-on-quarter to ₹73.85 crores, driven by exceptional revenue growth and improved operational efficiency. However, the stock's dramatic 9.15% decline following the results announcement reflects deepening investor concerns about stretched valuations and a prolonged technical downtrend that has eroded over half of shareholder value in the past year. Time: 1 hour ago
